title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-4.6 - Computation and recording of provision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-4.6 - Computation and recording of provision

State Regulations
(a) The provision for replacements is
predetermined by Table II of the schedule replacement reserve requirements (see
§
1647-4.3, subd. [b]) and no
computation is therefore required as in the case of the provisions for vacancy
and collection losses and painting and decorating. (b) See paragraph (1) of subdivision (b) of
section
1647-4.3
for the entry recording
the provision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-4.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
